dcterms:creator: Vassil Panayotov

dcterms:description: The LibriSpeech ASR corpus is used for all experiments, containing 960 hours of transcribed audio. The 'train clean 10' subset was used for comparison with other baseline models and hyper-parameter tuning.
dcterms:title: LibriSpeech

dcterms:creator: Daniel S Park
William Chan
Yu Zhang
Chung-Cheng Chiu
Barret Zoph
dcterms:description: SpecAugment is used for data augmentation during training, applying speed perturbation with rates of 0.9 and 1.1.
dcterms:title: SpecAugment

dcterms:creator: David Snyder
Guoguo Chen
Daniel Povey
dcterms:description: MUSAN is used for noise-augmentation in the experiments.
dcterms:title: MUSAN
